mapper.select: insert into orderinfo (orderid, userid, orderdate, totalprice, carid, receiptkey, receiptaddr, receiptlati, receiptlong) select ORDER_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{userid}, sysdate, #{totalprice}, #{carid}, #{receiptkey}, #{receiptaddr}, #{receiptlati}, #{receiptlong}} FROM DUAL
mapper.insert: insert into orderdetail (orderid, prodid, prodnm, prodprice, ordercnt) select #{orderid}, #{prodid}, #{prodnm}, #{prodprice}, #{ordercnt} from orderdetail d, orderinfo i where d.orderid = i.orderid
